title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!

title: Are the Days of High Quality Sci-Fi and Fantasy Shows Like Heroes Long Gone From Broadcast Television?
description: After decades of successful fantasy and sci-fi shows, broadcasters and a few streamers are stepping back from big-budget stories. The post Are the Days of High Quality Sci-Fi and Fantasy Shows Like Heroes Long Gone From Broadcast Television? appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Joshua Pleming

title: Enough is Enough: We Need a Kerry Washington & Tony Goldwyn Onscreen Reunion
description: Kerry Washington and Tony Goldwyn have mesmerized us with their chemistry since Scandal, and it's beyond time for them to reunite onscreen. The post Enough is Enough: We Need a Kerry Washington & Tony Goldwyn Onscreen Reunion appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Jasmine Blu

title: Doctor Who Boss Shares the Unusual Note He Got About Psychological Thriller Featuring a Deaf Character
description: The scariest episode of this Doctor Who season also was an illuminating one, for showrunner Russell T Davies. The Saturday, April 26 episode, “The Well” — which series leads Ncuti Gatwa and Varada Sethu both flagged (in the video above) as the season’s “scariest” hour, and “a psychological thriller” — takes place 500,000 years in […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Save the Dates: Julie Plec’s We Were Liars Premiere, The Old Guard 2 on Netflix and More
description: Make way for a new set of liars this summer. Prime Video’s mystery thriller We Were Liars, from co-showrunners Julie Plec (The Vampire Diaries universe) and Carina Adly MacKenzie (Roswell, New Mexico), will premiere with all eight episodes Wednesday, June 18. Based on E. Lockhart’s novel of the same name, the series “follows Cadence Sinclair […]
author: Vlada Gelman
